page.title: 06AGRICULTURAL CONTRACTORS
page.content: {The Powis family}farm 48 acres of land from Grove Farm on the Eaton Mascott Estate and run an{agricultural {contractors business}employing 5 men as well as the family. The{machinery includes 11 tractors, 5 combine harvesters, 3 rotary mowers, 3 balers, 3 hedge cutters, 2 sugar beet harvesters and 2 JCB's as well as seed drills, harrows, spreaders, sprayers etc.{Sample charges}/acre are: ploughing Â£10, harrowing Â£6, sowing Â£7 mowing Â£6, combining Â£22, sugar beet harvesting Â£44 and Â£1.50/ large round bale.{Outgoings}include purchasing new machinery eg.a combine harvester costs Â£55000 and a tractor Â£20000. On a good day 22 acres of corn could be combined but only 9 acres of sugar beet could be harvested. The late spring and wet summer have caused{difficulties}this year by overlapping work schedules.
